query: SELECT name, enabled, articlesPerDay, DATE_FORMAT(lastRunAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as lastRun, DATE_FORMAT(nextRunAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as nextRun FROM scheduler_config;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user mexMZK3NDs3KsAz.c76371ba20f6 --database jH6DLQ8FrZGu3jgVut4Sqk --execute SELECT name, enabled, articlesPerDay, DATE_FORMAT(lastRunAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as lastRun, DATE_FORMAT(nextRunAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as nextRun FROM scheduler_config;
stdout:
